title: Setup
text: The pages in this section show you how to create, design, and publish graphics that use brands managed by HDA. For now, this guide is only for production in RStudio using the suite of tidyverse packages (including ggplot2) and custom theming functions created to expedite consistent brand features.

title: Setup
text:
Load libraries

tidyverse
ggplot2
scales
etc

title: Inspiration
text:
Helpful guides

Theme building
Creating and using custom ggplot2 themes
Thomas Mock


Package building
What we learned from creating a custom graphics package in R using ggplot2
Pew Research Center


Color scales
Custom Discrete Color Scales for ggplot2
Garrick Aden-Buie
Custom colour palettes for {ggplot2}
Nicola Rennie


Color palette generators
https://www.learnui.design/tools/data-color-picker.html
https://projects.susielu.com/viz-palette

title: Setup
text: The pages in this section show you how to create, design, and publish graphics that use brands managed by HDA. For now, this guide is only for production in RStudio using the suite of tidyverse packages (including ggplot2) and custom theming functions created to expedite consistent brand features.

title: Setup
text:
Load libraries

tidyverse
ggplot2
scales
etc

title: Inspiration
text:
Urban Institute Graphics Guide

Custom-built urbnthemes package
Guide for each kind of graphic
Follows their graphic style guide
Functions address saving/output options

BBC Visual and Data Journalism cookbook for R graphics

Custom-built bbplot package
Guide for each kind of graphic
Functions address saving/output options

title: HFV Colors
text:
library(scales)

Warning: package 'scales' was built under R version 4.2.1

library(chroma)


Attaching package: 'chroma'


The following objects are masked from 'package:scales':

    alpha, show_col


The following objects are masked from 'package:grDevices':

    hcl, hsv, rgb

hfv_pal <- c(
  "#011e41", # Shadow
  "#40c0c0", # Sky
  "#8b85ca", # Lilac
  "#259591", # Grass
  "#b1005f", # Berry
  "#e0592a"  # Desert
  )

scales::show_col(hfv_pal, borders = "#ffffff", cex_label = 0.8, ncol = 3)





chroma::show_col(interp_colors(12, colors = c("#ccd2d9", "#011e41"), interp = "bezier"))

title: HDA Colors
text:
library(scales)

Warning: package 'scales' was built under R version 4.2.1

library(chroma)


Attaching package: 'chroma'


The following objects are masked from 'package:scales':

    alpha, show_col


The following objects are masked from 'package:grDevices':

    hcl, hsv, rgb

pal <- c("#445ca9",
         "#8baeaa",
         "#e9ab3f",
         "#e76f52")

scales::show_col(pal, borders = "#ffffff", ncol = 4)
